title: Medieval Music Pack Volume 3
description: The third volume in a collection of medieval and fantasy style music.
longDescription:
A collection of 25 original music tracks in a medieval and fantasy style. 13 of the tracks feature full ensemble music while 12 of the tracks feature solo instruments. These tracks are ideal for recreating the mood and sounds of the middle ages and fantasy lands. The tracks feature various instruments including multiple flutes, recorders, pipes, guitars, harp, harpsichord, and percussion.


Preview #1: https://soundcloud.com/david-dumais-687079117/medieval-music-pack-volume-3-preview-1


Preview #2: https://soundcloud.com/david-dumais-687079117/medieval-music-pack-volume-3-preview-2
